comment: Dr Msimangas heroics when she took on the global establishment were undermined all the way with the media deployed to viciously attack ANYONE who questioned the HIV/AIDS hypothesis as a denialist, same way they rubbish those who call for orderly migration xenophobic! Deja vu!
amr:
# ::snt Dr Msimangas heroics when she took on the global establishment were undermined all the way with the media deployed to viciously attack ANYONE who questioned the HIV/AIDS hypothesis as a denialist, same way they rubbish those who call for orderly migration xenophobic! Deja vu!
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (u / undermine-01
            :ARG1 (h / hero
                  :poss (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Dr"
                              :op2 "Msimangas"))
                  :time (t / take-on-21
                        :ARG0 p
                        :ARG1 (e / establishment
                              :mod (g / globe))))
            :degree (a / all-the-way))
      :snt2 (d / deploy-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / media)
            :ARG2 (a2 / attack-01
                  :ARG0 m2
                  :ARG1 (a3 / anyone
                        :ARG0-of (q / question-03
                              :ARG1 (h2 / hypothesis
                                    :topic (d2 / disease
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "HIV/AIDS")))))
                  :ARG2 (d3 / deny-01
                        :ARG0 a3)
                  :manner (v / vicious)
                  :ARG1-of (s / same-01
                        :ARG2 (r / rubbish-01
                              :ARG0 m2
                              :ARG1 p
                              :mod (t2 / that)
                              :ARG0-of (c / call-03
                                    :ARG1 (m3 / migrate-01
                                          :ARG1-of (o / orderly-01)))))))
      :snt3 (d4 / duja
            :mode expressive))
